txt.en: Defeat giants in the Misty Mountains.
Defeat giants in the Misty Mountains

You had thought these great creatures must be legend and myth when you were told stories of them by your parents. Not anymore. Their strength is as great as their size, and their bravery that of a creature that knows it is unmatched. Nevertheless, your valour has brought down a fair number of these foes, despite their immensity.
